com.konakart.liferay

Interface SingleSignOnIf


  • public interface SingleSignOnIf
    Single Sign On class used to retrieve customer information from Liferay. If the customer already exists within KonaKart, he is logged in using the Liferay Login module. If he doesn't already exist then he is registered before being logged in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCustomerId(KKAppEng kkAppEng)
      The following method provides an example of how you can get user information from Liferay in order to provide SSO
